title: INCREDIBLE HYPNOTIC JOURNEY: PART 1 - NON-VERBAL HYPNOTIC INDUCTION
description:
Dr. Paret uses fascination - the power of the gaze and his student enters a deep state of hypnotic induction followed by hypnotic ecstasy. This video is from Dr. Paret's non-verbal hypnosis masterclass that travels all around the world and where he teaches the most unique non-verbal hypnosis techniques of Fascination and Mesmerism. These techniques help the students to reach wonderful personal development as well as to become professional hypnotherapists. See what happens in the next part of the video, where the hypnotic experience continues stronger. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school.
